Description:
Candidate Requirements:Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
Proven experience in technical support or application engineering, preferably within the automotive industry.
Solid understanding of sales processes and CRM systems, with experience supporting sales and CRM teams.
Familiarity with customer relationship management, or related software platforms.
Technical proficiency in web technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and databases (SQL, MySQL, Oracle) is a plus.
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to diagnose and troubleshoot technical issues effectively.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate with diverse stakeholders and convey technical concepts to non-technical audiences.
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, manage multiple priorities, and meet deadlines.
Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality solutions.
Knowledge of the automotive industry, including dealership operations, automotive sales processes, or related areas, is a plus.Job Details
